title: GSMCDMA Sim Card
extract: During these intervals, phones can transmit their information. In order for the network to know which users are connected to the network, each phone uses a subscriber identification module card, or SIM card. SIM cards are one of the key features of GSM networks.Oct 28, 2018
extract_html: During these intervals, phones can transmit their information. In order for the network to know which users are connected to the network, each phone uses a subscriber identification module card, or SIM card. SIM cards are one of the key features of GSM networks.Oct 28, 2018
